        Parameters:

      • verifyCredentials

        public final boolean verifyCredentials​(java.lang.String username,
                                       java.lang.String plainText)
        Used to verify user credentials
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        plainText - the plaintext password of the user
        Returns:
        true if the username/password combination is valid, false otherwise
